text: Steven Maxwell Porcaro (born September 2, 1957) is an American keyboardist, songwriter and movie composer. He is known as a member of the rock band Toto. He was born in Hartford, Connecticut. Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:American keyboardists Category:American songwriters Category:American movie score composers Category:Musicians from Connecticut Category:People from Hartford, Connecticut Category:Toto (band) members
title: Steve Porcaro
